title: What font is this? It's similar to Propane...
content:
I've tried running this through the various font identifying tools but It keeps telling me it's Propane.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_mh3qarto0f1rs73t7o1\_500.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mh3qarto0f1rs73t7o1_500.jpg) | 37.89 KB |
author: pkmnjunky7

comments.content: The clumsiness of the /S leads me to believe that it’s hand-lettering…

Sorry, I don't know this type if it is. Looks more like a Frankenstein to me and /S could come from [Century Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/century-gothic/). For the rest, you could approximate it using one of these with more or less customization: [Le Gendarmerie](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gautier/le-gendarmerie/), [Kleptocracy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/kleptocracy/), [Speedwaystar](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/www.dafont.com/sf-speedwaystar.font), [Forque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150323184411/http:/www.dafont.com/forque.font)

I would worry about Speedwaystar being a legitimate font.

hhp
